articles.title: Prince William and Kate Middleton ramp up the loving gestures on their tour of the Caribbean - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have struggled to keep their hands off each other during their action-packed eight-day tour of the Caribbean, and drove fans wild with their loving gestures.
